message: Since beginning with Django, I've come across a few instances where I would have liked to have been able to implement some sort of form builder, or an interface allowing the user/administrator to build their own forms for a particular need. An instance of this might be for a competition form app, where the user would create a form with questions, or multiple choices etc.
Something like this might help. I believe it was created as part of the mezzanine project. https://github.com/stephenmcd/django-forms-builder
What would be an approach to programming this?
